hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Shadow Temple Boss Key Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #the Spirit Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Dodongo's Cavern#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Saria's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key Ring#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find the #Happy Mask Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Map of the Water Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key Ring#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that wearing the #Skull Mask in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.
